channel.title: Projects on Supriya Dutta
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Supriya Dutta

item.title: Camera: 1994-2007
item.description: Type of Project Tags Personal Data visualization, Interaction Design Link Tools used Static viz , Web based viz RStudio. D3js, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Cameras - with numerous brands available in the market, how do you choose yours? If you are a professional, chances are you are already aware of all your needs, have an exceptional budget, good knowledge of the lens you will need, your choice of effective pixel, and many other specifications.

item.title: Sketches in Processing
item.description: Lately I have been curious about Fractals and Psychedelic patterns. This escalated when I found out about Daniel Shiffman’s Coding Train tutorials. Here are a collection of explorations and Processing Sketches I worked on.

item.title: Visualizing Radiology data
item.description: Predible Health is an AI startup. They work with Artificial Intelligence to draw out information from Radiology data. We collaborated on a project to create physical reports for the users – Pulmonologist, radiologist, and patients. The objective of the project was to find an effective way of representing the Lung CT Scan data into a medical report, specially catered to our target users. The data we wanted to present was divided into three sections: Nodule analysis data, Low Attenuation analysis data, and High Attenuation analysis data.

item.title: Zuci: Multiplayer Phy-gital game
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Game Design, Interaction Design Guide1 Tools used Prof. Uday Athavankar Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Guide Tools used Folk musical instruments form an integral part of one's community. Due to the lack of practitioners, rigorous processes of construction(of these instruments) the audience base of these instruments have decreased considerably.

item.title: Mukha Shilpa
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Cultural Guide Tools used Dr. Hemchandra Goswami Hands, bamboo sticks(anything works :p) Link Mukha Shilpa Assam: Traditional art of mask making Majuli district (27.0016° N, 94.2243° E) is a river island in Assam, surrounded by the river Brahmaputra.

item.title: My Friend Mr Leakey
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Typesetting, Graphics Design, Illustration Guide Tools used Prof. Girish Dalvi InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop Author J. B. S. Haldane and his book My Friend Mr Leakey always fascinated me. It has been one of my favorite books. During my Master's we were asked to redesign any of our favorite books.
